sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './Home.css'; function App() { const [e_sal_emp_code, sete_sal_emp_code] = useState(''); const [employeeDetails, setEmployeeDetails] = useState(null); const getEmployeeDetails = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/employee/${e_sal_emp_code}`); setEmployeeDetails(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error(error); // Handle error } }; const downloadDetails = () => { if (employeeDetails) { const dataUri = `data:text/json;charset=utf-8,${encodeURIComponent( JSON.stringify(employeeDetails) )}`; const downloadLink = document.createElement('a'); downloadLink.href = dataUri; downloadLink.download = `salary_details_${e_sal_emp_code}.json`; document.body.appendChild(downloadLink); downloadLink.click(); document.body.removeChild(downloadLink); } }; return (


sete_sal_emp_code(e.target.value)} />    


{employeeDetails && (
Salary Details
Employee Name: {employeeDetails[19]}
Employee Code: {employeeDetails[2]}
Salary Month: {employeeDetails[0]}
Salary Year: {employeeDetails[1]}
Net salary: {parseFloat(employeeDetails[18]).toFixed(2)}




Gross Details
Basic Salary: {employeeDetails[5]}
Special pay: {employeeDetails[4]}
Dearness Allowances(DA): {employeeDetails[6]}
House Rent Allowances(HRA): {employeeDetails[7]}
Transport Allowance: {employeeDetails[11]}
Gross Salary: {employeeDetails[8]}
Gross Deductions
Lic Deduction: {employeeDetails[9]}
Advance: {employeeDetails[10]}
Employee State Insurance(ESI): {employeeDetails[12].toFixed(2)}
Provident Fund(PF): {employeeDetails[15].toFixed(2)}
Employee Provident Fund (EPF): {employeeDetails[13].toFixed(2)}
Family Pension Fund: {employeeDetails[14].toFixed(2)}
Others: {employeeDetails[16]}
Gross Deductions : {employeeDetails[17].toFixed(2)}
{/* Download button */}
)}
); } export default App;
